description:
Tiago Freitas and Pedro Costa will be teaching about One-Shot Learning using Siamese Networks and how to use Active Learning to help labelling your dataset. 
AGENDA
18:30 – ✅ Check-in
18:45 – 🎙 Introduction to One-shot learning using siamese networks with Tiago Freitas
19:30 – ☕️ Coffee break
19:45 – 🎙 Using a model to help you label your dataset with Pedro Costa
name: Machine Learning Porto #1 - One-Shot Learning & Active Learning
